mechanics.outcome: Summon a spirit steed of chosen form (e.g., warhorse, pony, camel, elk, mastiff). Steed's type is Celestial, Fey, or Fiend (caster's choice). If steed's base Intelligence is 5 or less, its Intelligence becomes 6, and it gains the ability to understand one chosen language spoken by caster.

mechanics.trigger: Casting a spell while mounted on the steed
mechanics.outcome: The spell also targets the steed
Steed disappears, leaving no physical form

mechanics.condition: Caster chooses to dismiss the steed
Previous steed disappeared (due to 0 HP or dismissal)
mechanics.outcome: The same steed is summoned, restored to its hit point maximum

mechanics.condition: Steed is within 1 mile of caster
mechanics.outcome: Caster can communicate telepathically with the steed

mechanics.trigger: Attempting to summon or bond with a new steed via this spell
mechanics.condition: Caster already has a steed bonded by this spell
mechanics.outcome: Cannot have more than one steed bonded by this spell at a time

mechanics.condition: Caster chooses to release the steed from its bond
mechanics.outcome: Steed is released from its bond and disappears

description_text: You summon a spirit that assumes the form of an unusually intelligent, strong, and loyal steed, creating a long-lasting bond with it. Appearing in an unoccupied space within range, the steed takes on a form that you choose, such as a warhorse, a pony, a camel, an elk, or a mastiff. (Your GM might allow other animals to be summoned as steeds.) The steed has the statistics of the chosen form, though it is a celestial, fey, or fiend (your choice) instead of its normal type. Additionally, if your steed has an Intelligence of 5 or less, its Intelligence becomes 6, and it gains the ability to understand one language of your choice that you speak.While mounted on your steed, you can make any spell you cast that targets only you also target your steed.When the steed drops to 0 hit points, it disappears, leaving behind no physical form. You can also dismiss your steed at any time as an action, causing it to disappear. In either case, casting this spell again summons the same steed, restored to its hit point maximum.While your steed is within 1 mile of you, you can communicate with it telepathically.You can't have more than one steed bonded by this spell at a time. As an action, you can release the steed from its bond at any time, causing it to disappear.
